## Weekly Update - 2026-02-15

Hey <@&1424461167883194418>! üêù The hive has been absolutely buzzing this week. We've merged **27 PRs**, and honestly? The loot drop is legendary. Here is what you can play with right now:

üïµÔ∏è **Agents That Surf**
Say hello to **OpenClaw** integration! Your AI agents can now perform web searches and interact with the internet. One-command agents just got a whole lot smarter.

üé¨ **Director Mode Unlocked**
Video generation is leveling up with **Grok Image-to-Video** support. We also unified video resolutions, so your creations look crisp no matter the format. Plus, **ElevenLabs Scribe v2** is here to make your audio sound smoother than honey.

üß† **New Flavors & Roleplay**
Model collectors, eat your heart out. We've added **GLM-5** for general brilliance and the **Qwen-character** model for our roleplay enthusiasts. The `Polly` API also got an embeddings upgrade, making the platform's brain faster and sharper.

üíÖ **Quality of Life**
The **App Showcase** got a massive UI overhaul (it looks *clean*), and we've merged the Docs directly into the Play page. Less tab switching, more building.

Go break things (creatively). We can't wait to see what you make! üå∏
